猨字的基本解释

猨
yuán
同“猿”。

猨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yuán］
［《廣韻》雨元切，平元，云。］
亦作“猨1”。
灵长类动物。哺乳纲。似猴而大，没有颊囊和尾巴。生活在森林中。种类很多，有猩猩、长臂猿等。

猨字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　猨； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页714第18
【廣韻】雨元切【集韻】于元切，?音袁。【玉篇】似獼猴而大，能嘯。【埤雅】猨，猴屬。長臂善嘯，便攀援，故其字从援省。或曰猨性靜緩，故从爰。爰，緩也。論衡曰：猨伏於鼠。今人取鼠以繫猨頸，猨不復動。【史記·李廣傳】廣爲人長猨臂，其善射亦天性也。【司馬相如·子虛賦】赤猨蠷蝚。【後漢·方術傳】五禽之戲，四曰猨。　又【司馬相如·子虛賦註】象俗呼爲江猨。　又【玉篇】亦作蝯。【集韻】本作蝯。亦作猿??。

Basic explanation of words
猨
yuán
Same as "ape".
猨
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yuán］
["Guangyun" Yuyuan cut, Pingyuan, cloud. ]
Also known as "猨1".
Primates. Mammalia. It is as big as a monkey, without a cheek pouch and tail. Live in the forest. There are many species, such as orangutans and gibbons.
猨
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 2] [Dog Character Department] 　猨; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 714 18
[Guang Yun] Yu Yuanqie [Ji Yun] Yu Yuanqie,? Yin Yuan. [Jade articles] It is as big as a macaque and can scream. 【Piya】猨, monkey genus. The long arm is good at howling, so he climbs up, so the word is from the province. Or it can be said to be slow in nature, so from 爰. Yan, slow down. Lun Heng said: Pretending to be in the mouse. Nowadays, people take mice to tie their necks, and they won't move. [Historical Records·Li Guang Chuan] He is widely known for his long arms, and his shooting skills are also natural. 【Sima Xiangru·Zixu Fu】The red cockroach. [Later Han · Alchemy Biography] The play of the Five Animals, the four are 猨.　[Sima Xiangru·Zixu Fu Annotation] Xiangsu is called Jiang Qiang.　[Jade articles] also made 蝯. [Ji Yun] This is a scorpion. Also known as ape??.
